list_definition.definition: to think of as being written, made etc by

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The play is attributed to Shakespeare.

list_definition.definition: to think of as being caused by

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He attributed his illness to the cold weather.
